name: Teton LEEF Lightweight Mummy Sleeping Bag for Camping, Hiking, Backpacking; Cold Weather Option, Compression Sack Included
short_description: ULTRALIGHT SLEEPING BAG FOR ADULTS: Designed for comfort without the bulk, ideal for camping, hiking, and backpacking trips.

product_description: Enjoy all the warmth of a snug mummy bag fit but with none of the claustrophobia. Our cozy LEEF mummy sleeping bags are innovatively measured above and beyond the industry standard to give you maximum mobility while maintaining the contoured fit for heat preservation. Roll over, stretch out— we’ve got you covered. Comfortable, dependable, and easy, trust Teton for the best gear for your next adventure.

name: Mummy Sleeping Bag - Adult Cold Weather Sleeping Bag Rated to 25°F - Waterproof with Drawstring Hood - Camping Equipment by Wakeman Outdoors
short_description: Cotton
Imported

3 SEASON SLEEPING BAG - Stay comfortable in temperatures ranging down to 25°F in spring, summer, and early fall with this warm sleeping bag. The mummy style features a drawstring hood that can be cinched around your face to keep you cozy all night long.

WEATHER-RESISTANT CONSTRUCTION - The 210T polyester shell is waterproof and windproof, for a camping bag that is just as ready for outdoor adventure as you are. You’re sure to sleep comfortably wherever you go with this durable adult sleeping bag.

LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN - This heavy-duty sleep bag features polyester fiber cotton fill for warmth, while still maintaining breathability. The 2.98-pound weight won’t add too much burden to your gear, so it’s a suitable hiking or backpacking sleeping bag.

EASILY PORTABLE - This compact sleeping bag folds down to 17-inches-long by 8-inches-wide and includes a carrying case for easy portability. Bring this backpacking gear on the go for your next wilderness escapade to stay warm and cozy in the outdoors.

PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: 210T Polyester and PP Cotton. Dimensions: (L) 83” x (W) 28” x (H) 3.5”; Rolled: (L) 17” x (W) 8”; 2.98lbs. Temperature Rated: 10 - 20°F. Waterproof: 8000g/(m²*24h). Windproof: 2500g/(m²*24h). Breathable: 140mm/s. Color: Red.
product_description: Get a great night’s sleep in the great outdoors with the Mummy Sleep Bag by Wakeman Outdoors. Featuring a waterproof 210T polyester shell with breathable polyester fiber cotton fill, this essential piece of camping gear is comfort rated to 25-degrees F to keep you dry and warm in cold weather. The drawstring hood cinches around your head to help keep you cozy, and the included carrying case makes it easy to take this lightweight sleeping bag on the go. Use this sleeping bag for camping, hiking, backpacking, and more to stay cozy and comfortable anywhere adventure takes you. IMPORTANT: Wakeman Outdoors is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on all of our products.

short_description: OPTIMIZED MUMMY SHAPE: The double sleeping bag for adults features a contoured shape with wider shoulders tapering toward the feet, enhancing coziness and closeness for couples while minimizing excess internal space to maximize warmth efficiency

STAY WARM IN COLD WEATHER: The couple sleeping bag for adults features synthetic insulation, rated down to 41°F. Its adjustable drawstring hood and windbreak work synergistically to block cold air, ensuring reliable thermal protection in variable weather

UPGRADE WATERPROOF DESIGN: The 4 season double sleeping bag shell is made of upgraded fabric, which can isolate external moisture, keep the interior dry. The touch is delicate and skin friendly, turning over silently, and you can enjoy gentle wrapping outdoors

ROOMY SPACE FOR COMFORT: The size of the mummy sleeping bag 2 person is 90.6 x 59.5 inches, which can easily fit two 6 ft adults. The extra-wide footbox design ensures plenty of space for both feet to stretch freely, maximizing comfort for a restful night's sleep

The adult mummy bag also has a drawstring hood that keeps the warm air in and the cold air out and away from your head and neck.
